title: Arabelle's Story
description: The royal family is under threat from a pair of fanatics, and after a failed kidnapping attempt, it's twelve-year-old Arabelle who ends up in the middle of it. Along with Derek Draco, the boy she simply cannot stand.Tales of Aloseria is a collection of short stories set in Rita A. Rubin's Chronicles of the Guardians universe.
author: Rita A. Rubin
